Class ManagerService

java.lang.Object
Service.ManagerService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IManagerService
public class ManagerService extends Object implements IManagerService
Service class for handling all manager-related operations such as creating and editing projects, managing officer registrations, applications, withdrawals, and responding to enquiries.

  • Method Details

    • createProject

      public Project createProject(String projectName, String neighbourhood, int room2, int price2, int room3, int price3, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, int slots, User user)
      Creates a new HDB project with the specified details.
      Specified by:
      createProject in interface IManagerService
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      neighbourhood - the neighbourhood where the project is located
      room2 - the number of 2-room flats
      price2 - the price of 2-room flats
      room3 - the number of 3-room flats
      price3 - the price of 3-room flats
      openingDate - the opening date for the project
      closingDate - the closing date for the project
      slots - the total number of available slots
      user - the manager creating the project
      Returns:
      the created Project object

    • hasProjectConflict

      public boolean hasProjectConflict(LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate)
      Checks whether the specified project dates conflict with any of the manager's existing projects.
      Specified by:
      hasProjectConflict in interface IManagerService
      Parameters:
      openingDate - the proposed opening date
      closingDate - the proposed closing date
      Returns:
      true if there's a conflict; false otherwise
